text: Sabai milera allahako dorila'i drdhatapurvaka samatirakhnu ra vibhajita nahunu ra allahako tyasa anukampala'i yadagara ki jaba timi eka arkako satru thiyau, ta usale timra hrdayaharuma premako srjana garyo ra usako krpale timiharu apasama bha'iâ€“bha'i bha'ihalyau, ra timi agoko khaldo che'u pugisakeka thiyau, ta allahale timila'i tyasabata baca'ihalyo. Yasa prakara allahale timila'i aphna nisaniharuko varnana gardacha taki timi margadarsana prapta garnasaka
